== Main Inclusion Report for sourcepackage ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/g/gsmlib, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Build dependency of kdenetwork, for kopete
 0. ''Security:''
** No <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=gsmlib|CVE entries]]</nowiki>.
** No <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=gsmlib|Secunia history]]</nowiki>.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
** Source code review:
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Package does not ask any debconf questions higher than priority 'medium'.
** No showstopper <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:gsmlib|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>.
** Good <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.debian.org/g/gsmlib.html|maintenance in Debian]]</nowiki>.
** Not Very Active <nowiki>[[http://www.pxh.de/fs/gsmlib/|upstream]]</nowiki>.
** No upstream bug tracker
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Meets <nowiki>[[http://www.netfort.gr.jp/~dancer/column/libpkg-guide/libpkg-guide.html|Debian library packaging guide]]</nowiki> standards.
** Standard debhelper packaging, standard patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.

=== Reviewers ===
MartinPitt: evil prerm/postinst script (do not check $1, deluser without --system), no LSB init script, pretty much unmaintaned in Debian, dead upstream, missing manpages (not that important, though), hardware might be tricky to support
